listitem.para: Unburies the procedures, variables, and property lists named in the input. That is, the named items will be returned to view in CONTENTS and similar procedures.
See the Workspace Queries section for an explanation of the contentslist parameter.

listitem.programlisting: MAKE "foo [I am Foo] MAKE "bar [I am Bar] PONS Make "bar [I am Bar] Make "foo [I am Foo] BURYNAME [foo] PONS Make "bar [I am Bar] UNBURY [ [] [foo] [] ] PONS Make "bar [I am Bar] Make "foo [I am Foo]
